attributes.action: Review the result of the EU referendum considering the integrity of the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The preservation of the integrity of the United Kingdom, which has served us well for centuries, is far a more important issue for the future well being of this country than whether we remain in or leave the EU. This should be the primary consideration in any decision whether to invoke article 50 or not.
attributes.background: We call upon parliament to review the result of the EU referendum if it in any way threatens the integrity of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/148969
